measure.CatchLine: Requires the Department of Land Conservation and Development to provide grants to local governments to support middle housing infrastructure.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Digest: This Act makes DLCD give grants for denser housing. (Flesch Readability Score: 94.3). 
	Requires the Department of Land Conservation and Development to provide grants to local governments to support middle housing infrastructure. Exempts local governments from requirements to allow middle housing while grants are pending. 
	Sunsets January 2, 2028. 
	Appropriates moneys to the department for the grants. 
	Declares an emergency, effective July 1, 2025.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to middle housing; and declaring an emergency.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to middle housing; declaring an emergency.
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
Referred to Housing and Homelessness with subsequent referral to Ways and Means.
